item.name: Home
item.description: Simple pasta recipes are among my favorite. Not only are they easy to make, they require fewer ingredients, which means I can usually pull it off even when my groceries are beginning to dwindle. Not only that, I find that simple pasta dishes allow the ingredients to do all the talking—thin slivers of garlic that […]
